title: Gaana Plus Subscription - How to log complaints ?
selftext:
There was this offer listed in Sodexo offers and discounts section: **12 months gaana plus subscription**. 

Upon signing up with phone number and following below steps to redeem, there was payment link to enable auto payment. I assumed the paid subscription will be effective after 12 months and provided my UPI details. It deducted Rs.499 immediately (yes, I entered my UPI PIN with wrong assumption) .  
Later realised, actual annual subscription charge is Rs. 299. 

After this, I can’t see my Gaana Plus subscription anywhere, and Rs.499 is lost .

Couldn't find any direct support/support contact in their website, logging a support request just accepts the complaint and no reference or tracking mechanism to follow up. Seen them responding in social media posts, and contacted there, but no luck. 

can someone suggest how we can contact Gaana?

&#x200B;

https://preview.redd.it/02n8qt7b0qga1.png?width=617&format=png&auto=webp&v=enabled&s=389a3914daa4c1645435c41de05ab8fc2ef9c922
comments:
Why would you ever put upi pin?
Once oin is given nothing can be done. No vank will help you.

I understand that and would not worry if I had got something in return.
Unfortunately the subscription was also not given
